name: Mystiks
description:
Taleria is a world where magical and technological factions, Druids and Mavens, separate themselves from one another. Each faction believes the other is wrong and prepares for war with the other. 

Mystiks is a twine game about the magical side of this world that puts you in the life of one of the Druid families. You must make decisions that will completely alter the outcome of the game, and even uncover secrets if you make the right ones.
